text: Sha Kok is one of the 41 constituencies in the Sha Tin District in Hong Kong. The constituency returns one district councillor to the Sha Tin District Council, with an election every four years. The Sha Kok constituency is loosely based on Mei Chung Court, Peak One, Granville Garden, Heung Fan Liu New Village and part of Mei Tin Estate, with an estimated population of 16,061. ==Councillors represented== ===1985 to 1991=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Election!!Member!!colspan="2"|Party!!Member!!colspan="2"|Party |- | 1985 | rowspan=2| Chan Hon-ying | rowspan=2 style="background-color: " | | rowspan=2| Independent | Lau Yuk-tong |style="background-color: " | | Independent |- | 1988 | Tam Fao-chuen |style="background-color: " | | Independent |- |} ===1991 to present=== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- | style="background-color: " | | 1991 | Chan Hon-ying | Independent |- |style="background-color: " | | 1994 | rowspan=2| Leung Bing-wa | Democratic |- | style="background-color: " | | 199? | Independent |- |style="background- color: " | | 1999 | rowspan=2| Yeung Sin-hung | Civil Force |- |style="background-color: " | | 2014 | NPP/CF |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | rowspan=2| Billy Chan Shiu-yeung | Neo Democrats |- | style="background-color: " | | 2016 | Independent |} ==Election results== ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ===1990s=== ===1980s=== ==References== Category:Sha Tin Wai Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sha Tin District Council Category:1985 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 1985
